0.question: Why do boogers taste good?
0.answer: Boogers are made up of dried mucus, dirt, pollen, and other particles that accumulate in the nose. They do not taste good and are not meant to be consumed. Eating boogers can introduce bacteria and germs into the body that can cause infections and harm to your health. It is important to use tissues or blow your nose to remove boogers from your nose.
